triples.name: Recommender system
triples.relevance: The paper surveys conversational approaches to the core task of recommending items to users.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: The survey cites significant progress in NLP as a key driver for the development of conversational recommender systems.

triples.name: Chatbot
triples.relevance: Chatbot technology is identified as a key enabler that has contributed to the emergence and increased use of conversational recommender systems.

triples.name: Preference elicitation
triples.relevance: Preference elicitation is a core component that conversational recommender systems help to improve through interactive dialogue.
